latest.title: Director Appointment
latest.content:
8 Dec 2025 15:00
RNS Number : 6995K
Sealand Capital Galaxy Limited
08 December 2025
THE INFORMATION CONTAINED WITHIN THIS ANNOUNCEMENT IS DEEMED BY THE COMPANY TO CONSTITUTE INSIDE INFORMATION AS STIPULATED UNDER THE MARKET ABUSE REGULATION (EU) NO. 596/2014, AS AMENDED, WHICH BY VIRTUE OF THE EUROPEAN UNION (WITHDRAWAL) ACT 2018 FORMS PART OF UK LAW. ON THE PUBLICATION OF THIS ANNOUNCEMENT VIA A REGULATORY INFORMATION SERVICE THIS INSIDE INFORMATION IS NOW CONSIDERED TO BE IN THE PUBLIC DOMAIN.
Sealand Capital Galaxy Limited
("
Sealand
" or the "
Company
")
Director Appointment
Sealand Capital Galaxy Limited announces the appointment of Mr Siqi Cao to the Board as Executive Director with immediate effect.
Mr. Cao, aged 44, is a seasoned entrepreneur and executive equipped with a Doctor of Business Administration and an MBA from EU Business School, as well as a Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration from the University of Toronto. Currently serving as Chief Executive Officer of Fern Win Capital, he previously founded Shengshi Jiahe
Group
. His current directorship includes a role at Glitter Connect Group Limited, a wholly owned subsidiary of Sealand Capital
Galaxy
, and he also held a board position at Top KingWin Ltd within the past five years.
Current directorships
·
Glitter Connect Group Limited (April 2025 - present)
Directorships held within the previous 5 years
·
Top KingWin Ltd (July 2022 - September 2024)
In accordance with LR 9.6.13R there is no further information to be disclosed.
Commenting on the appointment, Dr Thomas Sawyer, Chief Executive Officer, said:
"We are delighted to welcome Mr Cao to the Board of Sealand Capital Galaxy. His deep experience in capital markets, corporate management and strategic investment across multiple sectors will add tremendous value as we enter our next phase of growth. With sharp strategic acumen and profound industry insights, Mr. Cao will be supporting Sealand Capital Galaxy's business development initiatives and contributing robustly to the company's next phase of growth as a key member of its leadership team."
Enquiries
Sealand Capital Galaxy Limited
Dr Thomas Sawyer Chief Executive Officer

latest.title: Publication of a Prospectus
latest.content:
7 Nov 2025 12:05
RNS Number : 7144G
Sealand Capital Galaxy Limited
07 November 2025
THE INFORMATION CONTAINED WITHIN THIS ANNOUNCEMENT IS DEEMED BY THE COMPANY TO CONSTITUTE INSIDE INFORMATION AS STIPULATED UNDER THE MARKET ABUSE REGULATION (EU) NO. 596/2014, AS AMENDED, WHICH BY VIRTUE OF THE EUROPEAN UNION (WITHDRAWAL) ACT 2018 FORMS PART OF UK LAW. ON THE PUBLICATION OF THIS ANNOUNCEMENT VIA A REGULATORY INFORMATION SERVICE, THIS INSIDE INFORMATION IS NOW CONSIDERED TO BE IN THE PUBLIC DOMAIN.
Sealand Capital Galaxy Limited
("
Sealand
" or the "
Company
")
Publication of a Prospectus
Sealand Capital Galaxy Limited [LSE: SCGL], an IT, Social Media and Technology company focused on consolidating compelling opportunities in the global marketplace, announces that the Financial Conduct Authority has approved a prospectus dated 7 November 2025 (the "Prospectus").
The Prospectus relates to the admission of 113,628,767 ordinary shares of £0.0001 each to the Equity Shares (Transition) category of the Official List of the Financial Conduct Authority and to trading on the London Stock Exchange's main market for listed securities. Admission of the relevant securities is expected to occur at 8:00am on 12 November 2025 ("Admission"). Dealings are expected to commence at the same time.
The full Prospectus is available on the Company's website at
www.sealandcapitalgalaxy.com
and will be submitted to the Financial Conduct Authority's National Storage Mechanism, where it will be available for inspection at
https://data.fca.org.uk/#/nsm/nationalstoragemechanism
.
Following Admission, the Company's issued share capital will comprise 1,011,534,756 ordinary shares of £0.0001 each, each carrying one vote. The Company does not hold any shares in treasury. The total voting rights figure of 1,011,534,756 may be used by shareholders for the purposes of the FCA's Disclosure Guidance and Transparency Rules.
The Board believes the publication of the Prospectus and Admission will provide improved access to capital to support the Company's growth plans as it continues to progress its strategic objectives.
-Ends-
Enquiries:
Sealand Capital Galaxy Limited

latest.title: Half-year Report
latest.content:
4 Oct 2021 07:00
RNS Number : 8267N
Sealand Capital Galaxy Limited
04 October 2021
Sealand Capital Galaxy Limited
("Sealand" or the "Company")
Unaudited Interim Results
Sealand Capital Galaxy Limited (LSE: SCGL) announces that it has today published its unaudited Interim Results with respect to the Company and its subsidiaries. The Interim Results are available to view on the Company's website at
http://scg-ltd.com/
Nelson Law, Executive Chairman commented:
"The COVID-19 outbreak has negatively impacted various economies that the Group operates in, and travel restrictions have been imposed. We are now leveraging our partner relationships with Tencent, Tenet and Alibaba to help overseas merchants access the huge Chinese market and sell their products and services; however, we are also proactively pursuing acquisition and joint venture opportunities to help develop our business, and we remain in discussions with a European business-to-business marketing technology company, initially with a view to obtaining an exclusive licence to use their technology in the Chinese market.
"In an ever-increasingly connected world, a process sped up further by COVID-19, the e-commerce bridges we are building between UK merchants and Chinese consumers seem more apposite than ever before.
"We continue to believe that our ability to offer commercial and logistical solutions to businesses in a world that is moving ever more rapidly towards online shopping and away from physical stores will be critical for the growth of the business."
-Ends-
Enquiries:
Sealand Capital Galaxy Limited
Law Chung Lam Nelson, Executive Chairman
+ 44 (0) 753 795 9788

latest.title: Exercise of Warrants
latest.content:
22 May 2025 10:22
RNS Number : 7898J
Sealand Capital Galaxy Limited
22 May 2025
THIS ANNOUNCEMENT CONTAINS INSIDE INFORMATION FOR THE PURPOSES OF ARTICLE 7 OF EU REGULATION 596/2014 (WHICH FORMS PART OF DOMESTIC UK LAW PURSUANT TO THE EUROPEAN UNION (WITHDRAWAL) ACT 2018 ("EUWA")) ("UK MAR")
Sealand Capital Galaxy Limited
("Sealand" or "the Company")
Exercise of Warrants
Exercise of Warrants
Sealand announces it has received notice to exercise warrants over 31,000,000 new ordinary shares of £0.0001 each in the Company
(
the
"Warrant Shares")
.
The Warrant Shares are being issued pursuant to the exercise of warrants granted and announced on the 30th of December 2024. Subscription monies of £77,500 have been received by Sealand in respect of this exercise.
Admission and Total Voting Rights
Application will be made for the Warrant Shares to be admitted to the Equity shares (transition) segment of the Official List and to trading on the main market of the London Stock Exchange plc ("
Admission
"). It is expected that Admission will become effective and that dealings in the Warrant Shares will commence at 8.00am on or around 27th of May 2025.
Following Admission, the total issued share capital of the Company will consist of 897,905,989 Ordinary Shares. Therefore, the total number of voting rights in the Company is 897,905,989 and this figure may be used by shareholders in the Company as the denominator for the calculations by which they will determine if they are required to notify their interest in, or a change in their interest, in the share capital of the Company.
-Ends-

latest.title: Results of General Meetings of Warrant Holders
latest.content:
30 Apr 2025 17:00
RNS Number : 9046G
Sealand Capital Galaxy Limited
30 April 2025
THE INFORMATION CONTAINED WITHIN THIS ANNOUNCEMENT IS DEEMED BY THE COMPANY TO CONSTITUTE INSIDE INFORMATION AS STIPULATED UNDER THE MARKET ABUSE REGULATION (EU) NO. 596/2014, AS AMENDED WHICH, BY VIRTUE OF THE EUROPEAN UNION (WITHDRAWAL) ACT 2018, FORMS PART OF UK LAW. ON THE PUBLICATION OF THIS ANNOUNCEMENT VIA A REGULATORY INFORMATION SERVICE ("RIS"), THIS INSIDE INFORMATION IS NOW CONSIDERED TO BE IN THE PUBLIC DOMAIN.
Sealand Capital Galaxy
Limited
("Sealand" or the "Company")
RESULTS OF GENERAL MEETINGS OF WARRANT HOLDERS
Further to the Company's announcement dated 25 April 2025 regarding the convening of general meetings of the warrant holders of the Equity Warrant Instruments dated 10 January 2025 ("Instrument A") and the Equity Warrant Instrument with an exercise price of £0.004 ("Instrument B"), Sealand Capital Galaxy Limited (LSE: SCGL) announces that both meetings were duly held today, 30 April 2025, at 3:00 pm at Birchin Court, 20 Birchin Lane, Bank, London, EC3V 9DU.
The meetings were conducted on short notice with the requisite consent obtained in accordance with the terms of the respective instruments. All resolutions proposed at both meetings were duly passed.
The Company will proceed with implementing the approved variations to the terms of the instruments, as outlined in the explanatory notice previously distributed to the warrant holders.
The information contained within this announcement is deemed by the Company to constitute inside information as stipulated under the Market Abuse Regulation (EU) No. 596/2014 as it forms part of United Kingdom domestic law by virtue of the European Union (Withdrawal) Act 2018 (as amended).
-Ends-
